msg: Specify the 'repository.home' framework property which is used by Lucene CopyOnRead feature to determine directory where index would be stored

author: mreutegg
msg: OAK-2829: Comparing node states for external changes is too slow
- Changed format of DocumentNodeState.toString() to avoid newline
- Align threshold for PerfLogger in ChangeProcessor and NodeObserver to 100ms

msg: Retain the original configuration settings and use separate getters the absolute value for all file/path attributes
